products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Tawny Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an authentic window dressing absolute in fashioning a striking, designer look, choose the kolsva deluxe in tawny oak for its craftsman quality louvres and elegant, coordinating ladders. The grouping of naturally toned timber with matching pelmets and rails creates a compelling feature that allows flexibility to suit your shading and privacy preferences. As the tawny oak features a quality, anti-cracking and warping component, fashion a distinctive dcor scheme in your kitchen, with similarly shaded surfaces.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Pale Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your chosen space into a celebration of function and form is all about adding something unexpected. With the deluxe version of the ever-popular pale oak offering from the kolsva range you'll be able to enjoy a calming natural colour that accentuates the free-flowing beauty of wood grain. There's nothing better than a lounge that allows you to switch off and put your feet up is there? With pale oak hanging with pride in your window you'll be able to create a theme with nothing more than a lightly coloured rug and matching ceramic table lamp.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style. Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics.

products.title: Kalmar Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar ridgeback is a subtly layered design that weaves woody browns and light stone greys together in perfect harmony. By finishing things off with light grey dashes that amplify the natural backdrop of the wooden grain it allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Turn the living room into the relaxing and homely space that you've always wanted by building your new colour scheme out from your windows.

products.title: Kalmar Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: A lighter finish always adds a more contemporary feel to a wood, and the kalmar in spanish cedar brings a classic edge through textured grain and a gentle polish. With high quality parts, and durable basswood, this blind also offers practicality by the bucketload. Finish off a clean and contemporary kitchen, with just a hint of country style, by incorporating the spanish cedar. White units will pair beautifully with wooden worktops, in a similar finish to that of the blind, and a refreshing duck egg blue will offset the look nicely.

products.title: Kalmar Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Kalmar Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark wood makes for a classic feature in any room and the kalmar's jacobean oak is a real statement piece. The sturdy, quality basswood, which we source from only sustainable forests, is stained in a traditional dark oak, resulting in a window dressing that offers both style and class. The jacobean oak speaks for itself, so keep its surrounding decor clean and simple, painting the walls in a homely cream and choosing sofas to match.

products.title: Kalmar Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: Painted in light grey, and with a pretty shabby chic effect, the kalmar in pearl river will make a fashionable addition to any home. The quality basswood is responsibly sourced from sustainable forests, so you can be sure you're doing the right thing for the planet - as well as gaining a gorgeous blind for your home. Use the pearl river to craft a vintage theme in your study, opting for a dusky pink feature wall and painting the remaining walls in soft cream or barely-there grey-white.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style. Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Kalmar Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey.

products.title: Kalmar Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider.

products.title: Kalmar Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Pearl River - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pearl river, from the plush kalmar deluxe collection, is pretty, chic, and at the height of fashion. Its vintage look is created by the light layer of blue-grey paint, through which the attractive grain of the basswood is clearly visible. Matching parts, including linen ladder ribbons, complete the look. Hang the pearl river in your master bedroom amidst a french-inspired decor scheme. Craft a subtle colour palette of pale greys and soft creams, adding the occasional hint of vintage pink for some characterful hue.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Jacobean Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Dark and atmospheric, the kalmar deluxe's jacobean oak offers true traditional style. Backed with coordinating linen ladder tapes and fashioned with a matching pelmet and bottom rail, the look is clean and coordinated, so that nothing can detract from this designer aesthetic. Craft a polished country look in the living room by matching the jacobean oak with a burnt orange shade on a feature wall.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Spanish Cedar - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the spanish cedar combines all of the simplicity of wood with the plush luxury of the kalmar deluxe range, which incorporates high quality wood, sturdy components, and coordinating detailing - everything from hand-painted slat ends to woven linen taping. Transform a dull hallway into an airy and spacious welcoming by melding the spanish cedar with cream or white walls and opting for country-style woods throughout.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Ridgeback - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you opt for the deluxe version of kalmar ridgeback you're promising your home a touch of the unexpected. By adding a rich tapestry of shade and colour to the mix you can create multiple jumping off points for a new layer of colour that flows gently around any room. We love the idea of use kalmar ridgeback in the conservatory where the increased window space compared to other rooms will allow ridgeback to really set the tone.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: Right on trend, the cotswold deluxe in oatmeal has a matt, chalky finish, perfect for any kind of design scheme from shabby chic to country rural to contemporary sleek. In matching cream, high quality components are provided, including woven ladder tapes that back the wide slats. Settle the oatmeal into a rural setting, surrounding it with organic hues such as sage and terracotta in a kitchen or dining space.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Turning your home into the one place in the world you never want to leave is all about getting your interiors working in perfect harmony. With iron mountain (deluxe) from the kalmar range you'll be able to welcome a contemporary colour through your door and see how it works in perfect harmony with the natural grain of the materials. We love the idea of using iron mountain in the bathroom to help break up the sea of light colours and crisp whites.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With kalmar cool grey (deluxe) you'll be able to create a homely interior that is on-trend and right up to date with the latest colour trends. The off-white detailing of the grain is a great way to lighten the mood and take the edge off the dominant background colour. Turning the guest bedroom into the homely space that your friends and family will never want to leave is all about finding the right balance.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Windrift is the latest addition to the kalmar range, and one that comes highly recommended for those of you looking to reinvent your decor. The gentle beige background serves as the perfect canvas for the whitened grain that shines through in all weathers. Turn the hard to decorate upstairs landing into one of the most pleasingly decorated spaces in your home with a light beige lampshade and matching piece of wall art.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: As your eye traces its way across kalmar barkley you'll see the natural way in which the stone greys and off-whites flow into one another. This is a design free of the rigid constraints of geometric patterns. Instead it finds its inspiration in the gently flowing patterns of wood grains. Turn the landing into the stylish transient space that you've always wanted with a little help from barkley. With a stone grey jug on a narrow side table and a rug along the landing you'll be able to bring everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a matt, chalky paint, the cotswold deluxe in marble grey displays a chic light grey tone on wide wooden slats that tilt with ease for versatile light and air control. Coordinating ladder tapes are an effective feature, providing a matching, coherent look for sleek designer vogue. Match the marble grey with a soft sky blue for a cool and contemporary look and a tranquil ambience in a baby's nursery.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you love the finer things in life you'll know that they don't come much finer than their deluxe version of cotswold ebony. By adorning your windows with the exquisite finish of their latest addition you'll be able to add that touch of timeless class that no home should be without. Transforming the master bedroom with a little help from cotswold ebony is all about not letting this dominant shade overpower things.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish. For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white. Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in oatmeal gloss displays an array of shiny, painted horizontal slats, which match the accompanying components of rails and ladder tapes. The slats can be tilted to be fully closed for privacy and light-blocking or completely open for light and ventilation. Form a classy living area by opting for a traditional chocolate and cream colour palette, placing the oatmeal gloss against a dark brown focal wall and surrounding cream walls.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Clementine allows you to bring the natural warmth and energy of the summer sun into your home no matter the time of year. A calming and uplifting colour that partners perfectly with the premium gloss finish is the secret to a venetian blind that will energise your home and put you in a great mood for the rest of the day. Combine clementine with a selection of pale yellows to give your room a summery feeling that makes you feel like getting creative in the kitchen.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Magenta High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Magenta brings with it an electric dash of colour that fills your home with energy and style by reinventing the classic venetian blind by bringing it right up to date for the modern home. The high gloss finish shimmers in the light as you create a focal point that will attract the eye all day long. For a room that fills you with energy and puts a smile on your face partner magenta with little touches of other electric colours so that you can truly bring your home to life.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plum is the perfect deep relaxing colour for those looking to get away from it all once they get home. The soothing character of plum works in harmony with the high gloss finish to provide a crisp and clean aesthetic which allows you to make a feature of window spaces like never before. Add in blacks and whites to celebrate the extremes of the colour spectrum as your touch of plum sits handsomely in the middle taking pride of place as the focal point of your room.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: An enticing shade of red awaits every owner of this tried and trusted member of the kaleidoscope range. The high gloss finish gently shimmers in the light as the finely shaped wood takes pride of place in your home as it provides that modern reinterpretation of a timeless style. Scarlet allows you to be bold with your colour choices and let the gentle tones and colours in your room take a step back as you create a focal point.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light blues have a certain charm that other colours simply cannot match. They energise a room and allow you to weave otherwise contrasting colours into a coherent whole. Carmen takes the authentic touch of an inspiring blue and combines it with unrivalled craftsmanship and a spotless high gloss finish that gently shimmers in the light. Match carmen with some light beiges and sandy browns to evoke memories of time spent resting and relaxing along the coast.

products.title: Colour Prime Vamp Real Wood
products.description: This collection has a bright and contemporary feel for a bold addition to your decor, but still reflects the beauty and elegance of nature. This solid red slat wooden blind is perfect to add a splash of colour to any room in your home. Product id: sdb-wsb0272 fabric colour: vamp material: bass wood headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 50mm slat material: painted finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes colour prime vamp real wood in red.

products.title: Colour Prime Electric Real Wood
products.description: This collection has a bright and contemporary feel for a bold addition to your decor, but still reflects the beauty and elegance of nature. This solid blue wooden blind is perfect to add a splash of colour to any room in your home. products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe Clementine High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Clementine brings a summery touch of energy to your decor that is guaranteed to put a smile on your face. The sleek gloss finishing shimmers in the light and the deluxe touch of the fabric ribbons adds a subtle layer of depth to this uniquely modern finish. Work some yellows into your decor and use clementine in the kitchen so that you can use the glow and radiance of the gloss finishing to spread some cheer and joy into the heart of the home.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plum is a rich and deep shade that helps add a relaxing and restful air to your home the instant you enter. With a high gloss finish that shimmers in the light you will be adding a touch of luxury that is perfectly accented by the ladder ribbons that bring this one of a kind design to life. We love using plum in the bedroom where the depth of the purple will allow you to switch off the moment your head hits the pillow.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe Carmen High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: The uplifting and luxurious touch of carmen works in perfect harmony with the gentle addition of the fabric ladder ribbons that add something a little special to your decor. The finish is sleek and the epitome of high quality gloss; exactly the finishing touch you have been searching high and low for. Pair carmen with a soft red to create a beautiful synergy between opposite ends of the colour spectrum.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Scarlet is an enticing shade of red that welcomes you in to put your feet up and rest easy. By combining a unique ribbon ladder with an immaculately polished surface that shimmers in the light we have created something a little special that will add a deluxe touch to any room in the home. Turn the living room into the colourful and relaxing space you have always wanted it to be by pairing scarlet with some cobalt blue walls and wooden flooring.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Lime is an uplifting and soothing natural shade that will add a sense of calm and balance to any room in the house. The high gloss finish shimmers beautifully in the light and the fabric additions allow you to add a subtle layer of depth to your decor. Perfect for adding something a little different that will provide the finishing touch you have been looking for. Turn your kitchen into a vibrant and uplifting space with lime shimmering in your window space.
